amendment.description: An amendment numbered 50 printed in House Report 115-702 to reduce the amount authorized for the National Nuclear Security Administration's Weapons Account to the amount in the budget request.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 50 printed in House Report 115-702 to reduce the amount authorized for the National Nuclear Security Administration's Weapons Account to the amount in the budget request.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 239 (Roll no. 228).
